string.value: It looks like you found Olivia's father, Joe. Although he seems a little distraught, you will need to escort him to the front yard.
Joe would like you to kill #b100 Sophilia Dolls, 1 Voo Doo #kso that he'd be able to walk through the hallway untouched.
You were able to defeat the#b 100 Sophilia Dolls, 1 Voo Doo #k. The hallway is now clear for him to escape.

Listen, I...umm...would love to see Olivia. It's just... It's just that I have an intense phobia of dark hallways. Especially when weird, creepy little toys come alive and walk all over the place! Could you do it? You know, take care of them for me?

I noticed several of these twisted toys going berserk in the house. Would it be possible for you to #b100 Sophilia Dolls, 1 Voo Doo #kto clear the way for me? I'd certainly feel safer then. Oh, and watch out! I don't know what kind of tricks they have up their sleeve.
It's understandable if I'm too afraid to do it. But you? C'mon! You're an adventurer, for goodness sakes!
When will I be able to go see Olivia? Can you defeat the scary toy monsters roaming inside the house so that I can go see Olivia?
So...are they gone...for good? Whew! I feel sorry for the sucker who had to go through all of that...Oh wait...that's you. I mean...shall we get going now?
I won't leave until I know all #b100 Sophilia Dolls, 1 Voo Doo#k are entirely disposed of.
